# Introduction

This tutorial demonstrates the complete workflow for identifying rare cell populations in single-cell RNA sequencing data using the scRareFind pipeline with BigSur.

## Prerequisites

- R version 4.3.2 or higher
- Conda environment with required packages
- Basic knowledge of single-cell RNA sequencing analysis
